meta.notes: Prototype data – replace with real CFP Top 12 when available.

rankings.name: Georgia
rankings.projection: Holds #1 with win; drops to #3–4 with loss.

rankings.name: Ohio State
rankings.movementText: Lost rivalry game; still strong resume.
rankings.projection: Needs title win + help to stay top 4.

summary.text: Summary placeholder: here we describe who controls their destiny, who needs chaos, and which conferences are strongest. Edit in data/cfp_data.json.

championshipWeekend.bestCase: Winner locks top-2 seed; loser still likely top-4 with close game.
championshipWeekend.likelyCase: Favorite wins by one score; loser slides to #4 or #5.
championshipWeekend.worstCase: Blowout plus chaos in other title games knocks loser out entirely.

championshipWeekend.bestCase: TTU wins convincingly and jumps into top 6 discussion.
championshipWeekend.likelyCase: Tight game; committee weighs strength of schedule heavily.
championshipWeekend.worstCase: Turnover-heavy loss plus other upsets push loser out of NY6 range.

TTU.bestCase: Win Big 12 title impressively, chaos in at least two other conferences, and committee rewards explosive offense with #4 seed.
TTU.likelyCase: Win or close loss in title game keeps TTU in top 8 with major New Year’s Six selection.
TTU.worstCase: Multi-score loss plus other upsets drop TTU into #11–#12 range or just outside top 12.
